title: Bethany The Vampfire 000 (c2c) (Brainstorm - 1997) (Talon-Novus-
description:
English | CBR | 36 Pages

Bethany the Vampfire #0
Publisher:  Brainstorm Comics
Publication Date:  November 1997

Writer and Artist:  Holly Golightly
Cover Artists:  Holly Golightly (as Fauve) and Roy Young

For about 350 years, Bethany has recorded her feelings and adventures of being the only existing Vampfire.  Tucking them away on thousands of pages in a little dark room away from prying eyes.  Along with her own diaries another is hidden, her mother, Salome's.  Inside Salome's book of Shadows, the necromantic secrets of creating a Vampfire are written as well as her experiences during the process.

No one has read these diaries, no one till Echo, Bethany's bloodchild, and now you.

Thanks goes to Talon for this release.
